title: Decadent quiche Lorraine
ingredients: ['Pastry', '175g plain flour', '100g chilled butter, diced', '1 egg yolk', '2 tablespoons cold water', 'Filling', '200g smoked back bacon, diced', '50g Gruyere cheese', '200ml creme fraiche', '200ml double cream', '3 eggs beaten', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 pinch nutmeg', '1 pinch mixed herbs']
